00015 #ifndef __MEZZO_TYPES__
00016 #define __MEZZO_TYPES__
00017 
00018 #include <posh/posh.h>
00019 
00020 #include <string>
00021 
00022 #ifdef POSH_64BIT_INTEGER
00023 
00024 // For use in situations where 32 bits could be a limiting factor.  For example, Buffer
00025 // does not need to use it because it makes no sense to have a buffer longer than two
00026 // million samples long.  SeqBlock does not need it.  Sequence does, and WaveTrack does.
00027 typedef posh_i64_t long_sample_count;
00028 #define LONG_SAMPLE_COUNT_MAX POSH_I64_MAX
00029 
00030 inline std::string LongSampleCountToStr(long_sample_count num)
00031 {
00032    char tmp[100];
00033    snprintf(tmp, sizeof(tmp), "%lld", num);
00034    return std::string(tmp);
00035 }
00036 
00037 inline long_sample_count StrToLongSampleCount(std::string str)
00038 {
00039    return strtoll(str.c_str(), NULL, 0);
00040 }
00041 
00042 #else
00043 
00044 typedef posh_i32_t long_sample_count;
00045 #define LONG_SAMPLE_COUNT_MAX POSH_I32_MAX
00046 
00047 inline std::string LongSampleCountToStr(long_sample_count num)
00048 {
00049    char tmp[100];
00050    snprintf(tmp, sizeof(tmp), "%d", num);
00051    return std::string(tmp);
00052 }
00053 
00054 inline long_sample_count StrToLongSampleCount(std::string str)
00055 {
00056    return strtol(str.c_str(), NULL, 0);
00057 }
00058 
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 #endif
